title: lee sin is BLIND he shouldnt be able to be blinded by teemo or quinn
body: lee sin is blind so there for blinds shouldnt affect him?

replies.body: also ignite should not work on brand
By that logic I think all of Lee Sins auto attacks should miss after all he is blinded 24/7

no instead he should permanently have no vision, only being able to see things he hits with his Q.

And i mean no vision, not even of himself or the map

fuck lee sin

I personally think he shouldn't be blinded but he should have a smaller radius of where he can see, more so a fog of war around his person, make it so he has more of a Rek'Sai pulse going on so you have to address a situation like a real blind man
yup i agree with something like this
Quinn hasn't had a blind since last year...
